Meet the backbone of Monk Entertainment.

It's the end of the financial year. The entire team is out of office because of the long weekend. 

But there is oneâ€¦ | 22 comments on LinkedIn
data.text: Meet the backbone of Monk Entertainment. It's the end of the financial year. The entire team is out of office because of the long weekend. But there is one team that is working round-the-clock to ensure that we don't get notices from the IT department ðŸ˜‚ Meet the FINANCE team of Monk-E. Owing to the industry we operate in, there is a lot of glitz and glamour, a ton of public appreciation for all our other teams. Although, this is one team that stays away from the limelight, toiling for long hours to ensure that systems and processes are in check. Because of them, we we don't have to worry about cashflows and payment follow-ups. Because of them, we don't have to bother about going through tedious excel sheets. Because of them, we don't have to be up-to-date with all the latest taxation jargon that the authorities come up with. Sarita Sonawane Saloni Joke Aayushi Jain Siddhika Desai Vaishali Chalke Tannu Purohit
